name: Gerhard Lakemeyer
content: Gerhard Lakemeyer Search Gerhard Lakemeyer Professor of Computer Science RWTH Aachen University Biography I am a Professor and former Chair of the Department of Computer Science at RWTH Aachen University and head of the Knowledge-Based Systems Group (KBSG). I am also affiliated with the Chair of Information Systems and Database at RWTH Aachen University. Interests Artificial Intelligence Knowledge Representation Cognitive Robotics
